Common errors: Excessive salary and bonus paid to related parties* for services rendered to the business.
Getting it right: Salary, bonus and other payments made should commensurate with the services rendered and should be in line with market rate.
context: getting-individuals-to-comply             Claiming of expenses paid to related parties

Common errors: Payments of salaries, allowances or CPF to related parties* when they are not employees of the business.
Getting it right: Salary, bonus and other payments made should commensurate with the services rendered and should be in line with market rate.
context: getting-individuals-to-comply             Claiming of expenses paid to related parties
